definition: any of various cosmetic or medical preparations dispensed in the form of a pulverized powder, apply powder to
details:
noun
- any of various cosmetic or medical preparations dispensed in the form of a pulverized powder
- a solid substance in the form of tiny loose particles
= synonyms: pulverization
- a mixture of potassium nitrate, charcoal, and sulfur in a 75:15:10 ratio which is used in gunnery, time fuses, and fireworks
= synonyms: gunpowder
verb
- apply powder to
= example: apply powder to
- make into a powder by breaking up or cause to become dust
= synonyms: powderize, powderise, pulverise, pulverize
